Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 172nd overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/5/2015...
Injured on 6/7/2016 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 9/4/2016 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for entire career...
Injured on 4/3/2017 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis (C) on 7/5/2017 (Going to MON: P Leonardo Benitez, RF Tracy Marshall. Going to STL: P Dion Granados)...
7/31/2017: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $11,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Injured on 10/1/2017 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
